definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
Chi You, legendary creator of metalworking and weapons/comet

sentences.english: Accordingly, the war took place in the Wei Chi Yanhuang downstream to the southern Shanxi to this area.
sentences.chinese: 据此，炎黄蚩战争发生在渭水下游至晋南这一地区。

sentences.english: Some differences in protein expression related to denuded tongue were identified.
sentences.chinese: 可识别和鉴定出一些与剥苔相关的差异表达蚩白质。

sentences.english: The temperature has been going up in Karachi, Pakistan recently.
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦喀拉蚩的气温最近不断攀升。

sentences.english: A boy sells old books by a road in Karachi January 7, 2007.
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦港市喀拉蚩的一个男孩在街上卖旧书。

definition: wild beast/wild horse/lion/trad. form used erroneously for 貌/simplified form used erroneously for 狻
used in place names, notably 瑯琊山|琅玡山[Lang2 ya2 Shan1]
branch of the Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑 nomadic people, founders of Wei 北魏 of the Northern Dynasties (386-534)/also written 拓拔
Xingtian, headless giant hero of Chinese mythology decapitated by the Yellow Emperor 黃帝|黄帝[Huang2 di4]
branch of the Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑 nomadic people, founders of Wei 北魏 of the Northern Dynasties (386-534)/also written 拓跋
